name: Super Easy Cream Cheese Flan
author: kimmy73
summary: This is a delicious, creamy dessert.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat sugar and water together in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until sugar dissolves into a light brown caramel, 8 to 10 minutes
Pour into a round glass baking dish
Place condensed milk, evaporated milk, eggs, cream cheese, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend into a smooth custard
Pour over caramelized sugar in the baking dish
Place baking dish in a deep baking pan
Pour in enough water to reach halfway up the baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until custard is set and top is light brown, about 1 hour
Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate until cold, 3 to 4 hours
